LanguageData.ZeroTechDrug.label: Enhancer
LanguageData.ZeroTechDrug.description: Sometimes, you may need to temporarily enter a state where implants or bionics are not appropriate, so why not try something that won't last as long?
LanguageData.ZeroTechDrugBeauty.label: Cosmetic medicine
LanguageData.ZeroTechDrugBeauty.description: This part of the drug may not make the body work better, but can optimize a person's appearance, for most people may be more useful.
